pkgmetadata.longdescription: Aloc Pe Ore Leciile Zilei // Leciile prof/cls trebuie completate cu un cmp "ora", astfel ca oricare dou lecii prof/cls/ora s nu se suprapun ntr-o aceeai or. The prof/cls lessons must be completed with a "hour" field ('ora), so that any two prof/cls/ora lessons do not overlap in the same hour. https://vlad.bazon.net/.
